description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with Juliette balcony, removal of chimney stack and installation of 3no front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion
decision_conditions: The erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof exstensions with Juliette balcony, removal of chimney stack and installation of 3no front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B and C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Condition 108 (Fire Hydrant Locations) states;"Prior to the occupation of the detailed part of the development, details of the location of an additional fire hydrant on Hook Rise South shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority, in consultation with the London Fire Brigade. The fire hydrant shall be installed and operational prior to the occupation of any part of the development."This condition was a result of a consultation response from LFB which stated;"Consideration has been given to the provision of fire hydrants and it will be necessary to install one new hydrant. The hydrant is to be installed in the location as indicated by colour red on the plan attached. The hydrant should be numbered 126974.The hydrants should be sited within the footpath - not in the carriage way, grass verge or flower bed, the hydrants should be one metre clear of all obstructions, with the outlet no more than 300mm below the finished ground level. The hydrants should conform to BS:750 and be indicated with a hydrant indicator plates conforming to BS:3251.Officers have reviewed the information submitted and note that the applicant has been in direct contact with LFB whose recommendation has been included as an appendix to the submitted cover letter. Officers are therefore satisfied this condition can approved.
Clarify proposal - the application form refers to the addition of 1x 2bed residential unit, but this is not reflected in the plans. Please clarify the proposal.
